Number 1: Like always, gotta explain it to the retards.

THIS IS NTR you retards. NTR, if you haven't done your fucking research is taking a LOVED one away from something via means of SEXUAL RELATIONS AND making the 'STOLEN' one of YOUR OWN. Hence not every time someone loved gets raped it falls into NTR

OR if it's not "Netoru" and just "Netorare", then netorare is the passive version of Netoru, they have the same meanings. That's why NTR can be either netoru or netorare.

 Since no one does their fucking research here is the Japanese definition of Netoru( NTR ). Kind of a mystery of how native Japanese artists get the definition right on the spot huh...?

NTR: 他人の配偶者・愛人と情を通じて、自分のものとする

And if you don't like NTR then why in the purple fuck are you on chapter 8 of an NTR series. Sounds like YOU'RE THE CUCKS.
